title: Strengthening Employment Relations and Organizational Learning Capabilities: Functional Flexibility and Strategic Learning Applications

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic organizational and human resource management concepts, foundational mathematical data analysis
context.additional_context: Modular learning in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment using mobile devices. Project-based assessment where administrators analyze real operational data to develop organizational learning strategies.

learning_goals: Ability to derive at least three functional flexibility indicators within organizations using a mutual investment employment relationship model
Ability to evaluate organizational exploratory/exploitative learning levels by applying mathematical analysis methods (regression analysis, cluster analysis, etc.)
Ability to explain the mediating effect of functional flexibility (task scope scalability) on learning outcomes through project deliverables
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
